name: The Puppet Show
description:
The goal of the game is to find the possessed dolls and eradicate them. The possessed dolls will move in place ever so slightly, so keep an eye out. The game created for Mini Jam 97 based on limitation of movement is lethal. 

Instructions: WASD for movement, E to toggle flashlight, Q to eradicate possessed dolls, SHIFT to sprint. 

There is no end scene so nothing happens once you reach the goal.
